translations: v.节省；避免浪费（economize 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Do not start economizing when you are down to your last dollar.
sentences.translation: 不要在穷得只剩最后一块钱时才开始节约。

sentences.sentence: All units and individuals shall have the obligation of economizing on water.
sentences.translation: 单位和个人有节约用水的义务。
